ingredients.ingredient: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix

cookingTips: Sear pork chops in olive oil until golden brown on both sides before adding sauce
Simmer covered over medium-low heat for 20-25 minutes until pork reaches 145°F internal temperature
The condensed soups create a creamy sauce that keeps pork chops moist
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How does searing the pork chops first improve the final dish? What's the ideal internal temperature for pork chops?
